tools.name: list_skills
tools.title: List Available Skills
tools.description: Returns the canonical skill URI(s) for repo-local skills. Read-only; no side effects. Use the returned URI with MCP resources/read to fetch skill content.
tools.responseRequirement: Response MUST include user-actionable text (e.g., skill name, description, and canonical URI in plain text) and MUST reference the same canonical URI used for resources/read: skill://hello-world/SKILL.md

securityBoundary.notes: Read-only discovery; no credentials or secrets.

textFallbackRequirement: Tool response must include plain-text content so non-UI hosts can use the skill URI.
